Detailed Description

Definitions for spinlock operations.

Define Documentation

#define CTK_SPINLOCK_EA ( lock_var   )     ((ctk_spinlock_ea_t)(unsigned long)(&(lock_var)))

A macro to get a lock reference for the given lock variable.

Parameters:
[in] lock_var - a lock variable (ctk_spinlock_t)

#define CTK_SPINLOCK_INITIALIZER   (0)

The ctk spinlock initializer

#define CTK_SPINLOCK_PTR ( lock_ea   )     ((ctk_spinlock_t*)(unsigned long)(lock_ea))

A macro to get a pointer to the lock variable from the given lock reference.

Parameters:
[in] lock_ea - a lock reference (ctk_lock_ea_t)

#define CTK_SPINLOCK_VAR ( lock_ea   )     (*(ctk_spinlock_t*)(unsigned long)(lock_ea))

A macro to get a lock variable from the given lock reference.

Parameters:
[in] lock_ea - a lock reference (ctk_spinlock_ea_t)

Typedef Documentation

typedef volatile unsigned int ctk_spinlock_t __attribute__((aligned(128)))

Spin lock

typedef ea_addr_t ctk_spinlock_ea_t

Function Documentation

int ctk_spin_lock ( ctk_spinlock_ea_t  lock  ) 

Acquires a spin lock. Spins while the lock is busy.

int ctk_spin_trylock ( ctk_spinlock_ea_t  lock  ) 

Tries to acquire a spin lock.

Returns:
0 if successfully locked, CTK_ERROR_BUSY (nonzero) otherwise.

void ctk_spin_unlock ( ctk_spinlock_ea_t  lock  ) 

Releases the acquired lock.

void ctk_spinlock_init ( ctk_spinlock_ea_t  lock  ) 

Initializes a spinlock
